name: streamdeck-googlemeet-browser-extension
description: Browser extension for Stream Deck Google Meet plugin

scripts.update-version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const {getVersion} = require('./get-version'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); pkg.version = getVersion(); fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2));"
scripts.package-all: npm run build && npm run package-chrome && npm run package-firefox
scripts.publish-chrome: echo 'Use GitHub Actions workflow for Chrome publishing'
scripts.publish-firefox: echo 'Use GitHub Actions workflow for Firefox publishing'
scripts.publish-all: echo 'Use GitHub Actions workflow for publishing both extensions'

author: Chris Regado
